title:
A deterministic proof of Loewner energy reversibility via local
  reversals
abstract:
We give a new proof of the orientation reversibility of chordal Loewner
energy by reversing the orientation of a chord in small increments. This fact
was first proved by Yilin Wang (arXiv:1601.05297) using the reversibility of
chordal Schramm-Loewner evolution (SLE). Our method is similar in spirit to
Dapeng Zhan's proof (arXiv:0808.3649) of chordal SLE reversibility, though it
is purely deterministic.
